statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT house_id, consumption FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE consumption > 100;
SELECT date, consumption FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE house_id = 5 AND business_id = 3;
SELECT AVG(consumption) AS AverageConsumption, COUNT(*) AS TotalRecords FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, consumption FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE house_id = 1 AND business_id = 2 ORDER BY consumption DESC
SELECT house_id, SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY house_id ORDER BY total_consumption DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT MAX(consumption) AS max_consumption, MIN(consumption) AS min_consumption FROM EnergyConsumptionData
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM households;
SELECT household_id, address FROM households WHERE electricity_usage > 100;
SELECT * FROM households ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT SUM(electricity_usage) AS total_electricity_usage FROM households;
SELECT business_name, energy_consumption FROM businesses WHERE energy_consumption < 5000;
SELECT * FROM households WHERE electricity_usage > 100 ORDER BY household_id DESC;
SELECT address FROM households WHERE electricity_usage < 50;
SELECT * FROM businesses WHERE energy_consumption BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY business_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT business_name, energy_consumption FROM businesses WHERE energy_consumption > 200 ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT household_id, address, electricity_usage FROM households WHERE electricity_usage IS NOT NULL ORDER BY address ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT household_id, timestamp, consumption_kwh FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY consumption_kwh DESC;
SELECT * FROM Households WHERE owner_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT business_id, industry_type FROM Businesses WHERE revenue > 10000;
SELECT MAX(consumption_kwh) AS max_consumption, MIN(consumption_kwh) AS min_consumption FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT household_id, business_id, timestamp, consumption_kwh FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY consumption_kwh DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE household_id = 3 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT hc.household_id, hh.owner_name, sum(hc.consumption_kwh) as total_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData hc JOIN Households hh ON hc.household_id = hh.household_id GROUP BY hc.household_id, hh.owner_name;
SELECT b.industry_type, COUNT(ecd.business_id) as num_records FROM Businesses b LEFT JOIN EnergyConsumptionData ecd ON b.business_id = ecd.business_id GROUP BY b.industry_type;
SELECT ecd.household_id, SUM(b.revenue) as total_revenue FROM EnergyConsumptionData ecd JOIN Businesses b ON ecd.business_id = b.business_id GROUP BY ecd.household_id ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE total_energy_consumed > 1000
SELECT household_id, total_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE business_id = 5
SELECT name, address FROM Household ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT DISTINCT industry FROM Business
SELECT system_name FROM SmartGridSystem
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE total_energy_consumed > 1000 ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT household_id, SUM(total_energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY household_id ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC;

SELECT Business.name, COUNT(EnergyConsumptionData.id) AS num_records FROM Business JOIN EnergyConsumptionData ON Business.id = EnergyConsumptionData.business_id GROUP BY Business.name ORDER BY num_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM SmartGridSystem WHERE location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY id LIMIT 10;

SELECT Household.name AS household_name, Business.name AS business_name, EnergyConsumptionData.total_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData JOIN Household ON EnergyConsumptionData.household_id = Household.id JOIN Business ON EnergyConsumptionData.business_id = Business.id WHERE total_energy_consumed > 500 ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT entity_id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE entity_id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM Households WHERE zip_code = '10001';
SELECT * FROM Businesses ORDER BY industry DESC;
SELECT id, meter_type, installation_date FROM SmartMeters WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT entity_id, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY entity_id;
SELECT h.name AS household_name, COUNT(sm.id) AS smart_meter_count FROM Households h LEFT JOIN SmartMeters sm ON h.id = sm.id GROUP BY h.name;
SELECT b.industry, AVG(ec.energy_usage) AS average_usage FROM Businesses b JOIN EnergyConsumptionData ec ON b.id = ec.entity_id GROUP BY b.industry ORDER BY average_usage DESC;
SELECT sp.name AS provider_name, COUNT(ec.id) AS data_points FROM EnergyProviders sp JOIN EnergyConsumptionData ec ON sp.id = ec.entity_id GROUP BY sp.name HAVING COUNT(ec.id) > 1000;
